mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM member WHERE mem_id=#{mem_id}
mapper.insert: insert into member( mem_num, mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_nick, mem_email, mem_phone, mem_kind ) values ( mem_num_seq.nextval, #{mem_id}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_nick}, #{mem_email}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_kind} )
mapper.update: update member set mem_verify='Y' where mem_email=#{mem_email}
